dmca.title: [ABUSE] site hosting obscene images
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2005 4:51 PM
To: sonicmortimer@hotmail.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] site hosting obscene images

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Sauron Snape <sonicmortimer@hotmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Tuesday, January 25, 2005, 11:17:47 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] site hosting obscene images

===8<==============Original message text===============
hello,
I believe one of the sites that is using The Planet's services,
SheezyArt.com, is in grave violation of the TOS, and I'd like to report it.
Their image archives have a great deal of photographed beastiality:
http://img.sheezyart.com/image/22/221998.jpg
http://img.sheezyart.com/image/22/222017.jpg
http://img.sheezyart.com/image/22/222161.jpg
http://img.sheezyart.com/image/22/222165.jpg
http://img.sheezyart.com/image/22/222168.jpg
http://img.sheezyart.com/image/22/222171.jpg
http://img.sheezyart.com/image/22/222173.jpg

Are examples. There's certainly more, but it would take me several days to
find all of it. They're fairly graphic, however.
The images were originally put up by a user, but the site owners claimed to
have deleted them when they didn't. I only found the first by accident.
I realise that it is against The Planet's TOS for a site they host to have
any images that go against applicable obscenity laws, and since in this case
it would be a federal violation, I decided to report it.

Thank you for your time,
- -S. Neuding



===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB9s04vK/XpJs6oyURAjw/AJ9Uqlabuth4ON51om77CA5xgUJfCACeJ6lF
595m3+QHIFWWiRwZzNjOCc4=
=pd55
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
